member.name: M:FsNuGet.Package.TryGetLatest(System.String)
member.summary: Attempts to find the latest version of a package by id. Searches the official NuGet repository only.

member.name: M:FsNuGet.Package.SaveToFile(System.String)
member.summary: Writes this package in nupkg format at a given path.

member.name: M:FsNuGet.Package.SaveToDirectory(System.String)
member.summary: Writes this package as a nupkg file in a given directory.

member.name: M:FsNuGet.Package.Install(System.String)
member.summary: Downloads the package contents and unpacks to a folder on disk. For example, `p.Install("packages/" + p.Text)`, will create `packages/MyPkg.1.2.3` folder with the contents of the package.

member.name: M:FsNuGet.Package.GetLatest(System.String)
member.summary: Like `Package.TryGetLatest`, but throws an exception on failure.

member.name: M:FsNuGet.Package.FromStream(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Reads nupkg format from a stream.

member.name: M:FsNuGet.Package.FromBytes(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Reads raw bytes in nupkg format.

member.name: T:FsNuGet.Package
member.summary: Represents a NuGet package at a specific verison.
